text: The Long Farewell () is a 1971 Soviet drama movie directed by Kira Muratova.Умер актер и режиссер, соратник Киры Муратовой Геннадий ТарасульДолгие проводы It stars Zinaida Sharko, Oleg Vladimirsky, and Yuri Kayurov. ==Actors== * Zinaida Sharko as Yevgenia Vasilyevna Ustinova * Oleg Vladimirsky as Sasha Ustinov * Yuri Kayurov as Nikolai Sergeyevich * Lidia Dranovskaya as Vykhodtseva * Viktor Ilchenko as Pavel Konstantinovich == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1971 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: The Long Farewell
